hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while the market is in NEUTRAL regime, the subsequent volatility expansion will trigger a directional regime transition within 5 trading days, with the direction determined by the breakout relative to the 20-day Bollinger Bands.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression in neutral markets often precedes significant directional moves. The Bollinger Band breakout provides a clear signal, while volume confirmation reduces false breakouts. Regime transitions frequently begin from low-volatility environments.
entry_conditions: BTC price closes above upper Bollinger Band (20,2) OR below lower Bollinger Band (20,2)
Volume spike > 1.5x 20-day average volume on breakout candle

exit_conditions.take_profit: 10% move from entry OR regime transition confirmed (BULL/BEAR)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Breakout candle low/high invalidated (close back inside Bollinger Bands)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days if no regime transition

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout occurs but market returns to NEUTRAL regime within 5 days OR volatility expands without directional regime change
